Name: SO-108
About the game: Explore the city of Fallbreeze and it’s mysteries as SO-108, an average citizen assigned for work at The Company. Read your emails, fulfill your tasks and remember, always be ready to consume. But be careful. Strange things have been going on around the city recently, and someone, or something, seems to have SO-108 in their sights. DYSTOPIAN FUTURE Help SO-108 climb the hierarchy in his work at The Company. Complete your assigned tasks and earn money to pay your rent, and more importantly, to consume the trendiest products. Balance your health, money and melancholy, or else SO-108 might find himself out of a home, or worse... DUAL REALITY Changing gameplay that paints the picture over SO-108’s life. Pilot a spaceship, shoot robots, break blocks, everything is an obstacle for SO-108, and new threats to his peace can show up at any moment, and some are closer than others... DUBIOUS CONNECTIONS Fallbreeze never sleeps, and with problems around every corner, you never know who you can trust. Guide SO-108 through life or death decisions, and discover the truth behind the city... WARNING This game contains flashing lights and fast flashing images that may trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
